LanguageData.CoalCrematorium.label: coal crematorium
LanguageData.CoalCrematorium.description: A huge stone crematorium which vaporizes corpses with extremely high temperatures. Burns coal and charcoal.
LanguageData.CoalFiredGenerator.label: coal-fired generator
LanguageData.CoalFiredGenerator.description: Produces power by consuming coal. Must be periodically loaded with coal by hand.
LanguageData.CoalGrill.label: coal grill
LanguageData.CoalGrill.description: A coal-fueled grill with an attached countertop for preparing meals.
LanguageData.CoalSmelter.label: coal smelter
LanguageData.CoalSmelter.description: Extracts usable metal from slag chunks and other mixed metal items. Consumes coal.
LanguageData.CoalStove.label: coal stove
LanguageData.CoalStove.description: Burn coal to produce heat. As with all heat sources, it must be placed indoors so it has a closed space to heat. Refuelable with coal and charcoal.
LanguageData.NECActiveCooler.label: active cooler
LanguageData.NECActiveCooler.description: Heats up liquid in a vacuum, the resulting gas absorbs heat and creates ice. Cools the room enough to keep spoilables fresh, but not frozen. Requires coal or charcoal refueling.
LanguageData.NECCoalLamp.label: coal brazier
LanguageData.NECCoalLamp.description: A steel brazier powered by coal or charcoal. Isn't as bright as a torch, but lasts a lot longer. People need light to move and work at full speed. Can be automatically refueled with coal and charcoal. Produces a small amount of heat.
